Patent Information.Abstract: Antifungal and antibacterial peptides, polypeptides and proteins as antifungal additives for paint and other coatings are disclosed, along with antifungal compositions, and coated surfaces with antifungal properties. Methods of using the coatings for treating and/or inhibiting growth of mold, mildew and other fungi and bacteria on objects such as building materials that are susceptible to such infestation are also disclosed.

Antifungal and antibacterial peptides, polypeptides and proteins as antifungal additives for paint and other coatings are disclosed, along with antifungal compositions, and coated surfaces with antifungal properties. Methods of using the coatings for treating and/or inhibiting growth of mold, mildew and other fungi and bacteria on objects such as building materials that are susceptible to such infestation are also disclosed.

Sequence Information.Source: Pelophylax nigromaculatus (Black-spotted frog) (Rana nigromaculata) (frog skin active peptide)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11682065]Gram-positive bacterium:Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2.5μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=10μg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=10μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=75μg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=22.5μg/ml), Proteus mirabilis(MIC>200μg/ml), Serratia marcescens(MIC>200μg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans(MIC=100μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:11682065]1.1% hemolytic activity at 100μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial activity against both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and against the fungus C. albicans. Has weak hemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed by the skin dorsal glands.

Literature.Title: Structural study of novel antimicrobial peptides, nigrocins, isolated from Rana nigromaculata.
Literature.Author: Park S, Park SH, Ahn HC, Kim S, Kim SS, Lee BJ, Lee BJ.
